sentences.sContent: The acetic acid is corrosive. Please put them in both sides of No. 5 deck, leaving a passage between the hatch coaming and the cargo.
sentences.sContent_eng: The acetic acid is corrosive. Please put them in both sides of No. 5 deck, leaving a passage between the hatch coaming and the cargo.
sentences.sCn: 醋酸（乙酸）有腐蚀性，请把其装在五舱甲板两边，在货物和舱口围板间留一条通道。

sentences.sContent: The frame number marks, made of steel plate shall be welded and painted on the hatch coaming and bulwark at the place of every 10 frame-space and at every bulkhead.
sentences.sContent_eng: The frame number marks, made of steel plate shall be welded and painted on the hatch coaming and bulwark at the place of every 10 frame-space and at every bulkhead.
sentences.sCn: 每隔10档肋位和每一舱壁处要用钢板割的肋位标记焊接到舱口围和舷墙上。

synos.tran: 天窗围坎；边材；[船]舱口栏板

trans.tranOther: a raised frame around the cockpit or hatchway of a vessel for keeping out water
